properties.query:
SOURCE '/aws/ecs/morpheus-api-dev' | fields @timestamp, @message
| filter @message like /DirectModelService|MODEL_DEBUG|Successfully refreshed|Error fetching models/
| sort @timestamp desc
| limit 100
properties.title: Direct Model Service Logs

properties.query:
SOURCE '/aws/ecs/morpheus-api-dev' | fields @timestamp, @message
| filter @message like /Successfully refreshed \d+ models/
| stats count() by bin(5m)
| sort @timestamp desc
properties.title: Model Fetch Success Rate

properties.query:
SOURCE '/aws/ecs/morpheus-api-dev' | fields @timestamp, @message
| filter @message like /Models data unchanged/
| stats count() by bin(5m)
| sort @timestamp desc
properties.title: Cache Hit Rate

properties.query:
SOURCE '/aws/ecs/morpheus-api-dev' | fields @timestamp, @message
| filter @message like /Error|ERROR|error.*model/
| sort @timestamp desc
| limit 50
properties.title: Model Service Errors

properties.query:
SOURCE '/aws/ecs/morpheus-api-dev' | fields @timestamp, @message
| filter @message like /Found mapping:/
| parse @message /Found mapping: (?<model_name>\S+) -> (?<blockchain_id>0x[a-fA-F0-9]+)/
| stats count() by model_name
| sort count desc
| limit 20
properties.title: Top Resolved Models

properties.query:
SOURCE '/aws/ecs/morpheus-api-dev' | fields @timestamp, @message
| filter @message like /GET \/health/
| stats count() by bin(5m)
| sort @timestamp desc
properties.title: Health Check Frequency
